com.metreeca.rest.handlers

Class Actor<T extends Actor<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.rest.handlers.Delegator
      • com.metreeca.rest.handlers.Actor<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the self-bounded message type supporting fluent setters
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Browser, Builder, Creator, Deleter, Relator, Updater

    public abstract class Actor<T extends Actor<T>>
extends Delegator
    Resource actor.

    Handles actions linked data resources.

    The abstract base:

    • looks for a shape body in incoming requests and redact it according to task/view parameters provided by the concrete implementation;
    • enforces role-based access control; Access to the managed resource action is public, unless explicitly limited to * specific user roles;
    • adds default LDP Link response headers for RDF sources.
    Request ShapeFormat body {optional}
    An optional linked data shape driving action processing.
    See Also:
    Linked Data Platform 1.0 - ยง4.3 RDF Source

      • link

        public static String link(IRI resource,
                          String relation)
        Creates a Link header value.
        Parameters:
        resource - the target resource to be linked through the header
        relation - the relation with the target resource
        Returns:
        the header value linking the target resource with the given relation
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either resource or relation is null

      • roles

        public T roles(Value... roles)
        Configures the permitted roles.
        Parameters:
        roles - the user roles enabled to perform the resource action managed by this actor; empty for public access
        Returns:
        this actor
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either roles is null or contains null values

        protected T pre(BiFunction<Request,Model,Model> filter)
        Inserts a request RDF pre-processing filter.
        Parameters:
        filter - the request RDF request pre-processing filter to be inserted; takes as argument an incoming request and its RDF payload and must return a non null filtered RDF model
        Returns:
        this actor
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if filter is null
        See Also:

      • post

        protected T post(BiFunction<Response,Model,Model> filter)
        Inserts a response post-processing RDF filter.
        Parameters:
        filter - the response RDF post-processing filter to be inserted; takes as argument a successful outgoing response and its RDF payload and must return a non null filtered RDF model
        Returns:
        this actor
        Throws:

        See Also:

      • sync

        protected T sync(String script)
        Inserts a SPARQL Update housekeeping script.
        Parameters:
        script - the SPARQL Update housekeeping script to be executed by this processor on successful request processing; empty scripts are ignored
        Returns:
        this actor
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if script is null
        See Also:
        Processor.sync(String)

      • handler

        protected Handler handler(IRI task,
                          IRI view,
                          BiFunction<Request,Shape,Responder> action)
        Creates a shape-driven action handler.
        Parameters:
        task - a IRI identifying the task to be performed by the generated handler
        view - a IRI identifying the view level for the generated handler
        action - a function mapping a request and resource shape to a resource responder; the possibly empty input shape is retrieved from the request shape body, if one is available, and redacted according to task and view parameters and the roles of the user performing the request; mode redaction is left to final shape consumers
        Returns:
        an handler for the specified shape driven action
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any argument is null

        protected Collection<Statement> trace(Collection<Statement> model)

        protected javax.json.JsonObject report(Report report)
